attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop Balancing your books by killing off the old age pensioners, by paying them an unlivable pension payment, and charging them inflated prices for fuel.This is the Governments answer to combat the 1945 population explosion.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
